Recruitment

Our Standards

We welcome men of all engineering majors to rush SPD. The Sigma Phi Delta Fraternity is historically known as a professional brotherhood of engineers. We hold professionalism and education among our highest priorities. All who wish to join must be studying either under the College of Engineering or an ABET accredited engineering major at Cal Poly and have a cumulative GPA no lower than a 2.7. This includes the following majors:

  • Aerospace Engineering
  • Architectural Engineering
  • Biomedical Engineering
  • Bioresource and Agricultural Engineering
  • Civil Engineering
  • Computer Engineering
  • Computer Science
  • Electrical Engineering
  • Environmental Engineering
  • General Engineering
  • Industrial Engineering
  • Liberal Arts and Engineering Studies
  • Manufacturing Engineering
  • Materials Engineering
  • Mechanical Engineering
  • Software Engineering

Rush Week Events

Day One: Kickoff Barbecue

  • Time: 6pm on Monday, January 14th
  • Location: Sierra Madre
  • Help us kick off our recruitment week by enjoying some grilled dogs and interacting with brothers in sports and conversation.

Day Two: Bowling and Bros

  • Time: 6pm on Monday, January 15th
  • Location: Mustang Lanes
  • Meet us at Mustang Lanes for a fun night of casual bowling

Day Three: Internship Panel

  • Time: 6pm on Monday, January 16th
  • Location: TBA
  • As college students, we understand the pressures of trying to get a summer internship and we are here to help. We have brothers from diverse jobs and majors who will answer your questions about the entire process. Get some help hints on your professional and academic skills right here.

Day Four: Night at the Castle

  • Time: 6pm on Monday, January 17th
  • Location: PAC
  • Meet at the PAC at 6pm and we will take you to our Castle. This will be the final chance to get to know us before we invite you to our weekend events.

The Weekend: Be sure to keep Friday night, all day Saturday and all day Sunday open for recruitment purposes. If you are selected to join, these will be important days. Please direct any questions to Recruitment Chairman Devon Subel: recruitment.spd.calpoly@gmail.com

Email
